# Version End Checklist

**Version:** [vX.Y.Z]  
**Date:** [Date]

---

## Pre-Release

- [ ] Build passes (`npm run build` or equivalent)
- [ ] No lint errors
- [ ] Tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Security scan clean

## Documentation

- [ ] WBS.md updated (completed items marked)
- [ ] THE_BOOK.md updated (version entry added)
- [ ] README.md reflects current state
- [ ] COMPONENT_REGISTRY.md up to date (if applicable)

## Backup

- [ ] Git commit with version tag
- [ ] Backup created (if major version)

## Handoff

- [ ] HANDOFF_NOTE.md written (if session ending)
- [ ] Open questions documented

---

## Sign-Off

| Role | Approved | Notes |
|------|----------|-------|
| Build | [ ] | |
| Docs | [ ] | |
| Security | [ ] | |
